meanings: lose the sight of one eye

examples.korean: Among the blind, the one-eyed is king. 발음듣기 장님 사이에서는 애꾸가 왕이다. Neungyule
examples.english: Among the blind, the one-eyed is king. 발음

examples.korean: He is blind of(=in) one eye. 발음듣기 애꾸 눈이다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: He is blind of(=in) one eye. 발음
